sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>When creating a problem, the Incident is automatically linked to the problem and state of the incident is: On-Hold > Awaiting Problem</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>approved</approval> <assigned_to/> <assignment_group display_value="Hikon Professional Services" name="Hikon Professional Services">0ea124de4f6463007e72aa95d310c750</assignment_group> <category display_value="Incident">c99d05924f2863007e72aa95d310c7b0</category> <company display_value="GB3">b771e09e4f6463007e72aa95d310c784</company> <description>When clickong on the Create a problem UI Action:  The new problem record is created, and the incident is moved to: On- Hold > Awaiting Problem with the new Problem record number in the related list</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 00:25:00</estimated_hours> <notes/> <number>TAS0001084</number> <package display_value="PACK0001015">ad90a6b24f60e3007e72aa95d310c7c7</package> <short_description>Problem - UI Action</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>New</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-20 20:49:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2827f56f4fa423007e72aa95d310c797</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>rachel.rowlandson@gb3.co.uk</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-24 08:48:59</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
